entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Burgeo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:06 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burgeo 3:30 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023

Humidity: 51 %

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17 except minus 23 inland.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 17 except minus 23 inland. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16 except minus 23 inland.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 16 except minus 23 inland. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023
